text:
Chapter 6

6.3.3 Replacing Agricultural lands by manufacturing units at Orgadum

Several multinational automobile manufacturers like Renault Nissan, Daimler Benz
and Ford operated auto factories on lands that were once water bodies, paddy
lands and forests.

Figure 6.5: Orgadum in 2006
